Title: The Taking of Dusklight Bridge
Description:
Let's press these insects back across the bridge and break their spirits!

Follow my lead.
ObjectivesText: Help Lao-Chin the Iron Belly hold the far side of the Dusklight Bridge.
RewardText: The mantid aren't likely to return soon after a beating like that... and now Lao-Chin is free to join us in the hunt.
